content.raw:
Hi,
There seems to be no WideAngleCameraPlugin, but there exists WideAngleCameraSensor in gazebo/sensors.

I want to use fish eye cam in Gazebo and  I want to publish images via ROS topic. The only way, it seems, is to write a gazebo_ros_wideangle_camera, which links to libwideanglecameraplugin.so.
content.html:
Hi, There seems to be no WideAngleCameraPlugin, but there exists WideAngleCameraSensor in gazebo/sensors.

I want to use fish eye cam in Gazebo and I want to publish images via ROS topic. The only way, it seems, is to write a gazebo_ros_wideangle_camera, which links to libwideanglecameraplugin.so.
